description: Contains metadata about the records grouped by a facet on a specific day

total_active_records.desription: Number of active records for this facet

total_new_records.desription: Number of new records for this facet

category_counts.description: Mapping of categories to counts, object shape is dynamic so it has no schema

copyright_counts.description: Mapping of copyrights to counts, object shape is dynamic so it has no schema
